org.bytemechanics.logger.adapters

Interface LoggerAdapter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LoggerConsoleImpl, LoggerJSRLoggingImpl, LoggerLog4j2Extension, LoggerLog4j2Impl, LoggerLog4jImpl, LoggerMavenPluginImpl

    public interface LoggerAdapter
    Logger adapter to implement to provider lower level API support
    Since:
    2.1.0
    Author:
    afarre

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getName()
      Returns the logger name
      boolean isEnabled(Level _level)
      Check if an specific _level is enabled
      default boolean isEnabled(Log _log)
      Check if the given _log would be printed if logged
      void log(Log _log)
      Send the given _log to the underlying API

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the logger name
        Returns:
        logger name

      • isEnabled

        boolean isEnabled(Level _level)
        Check if an specific _level is enabled
        Parameters:
        _level - fluent logger level
        Returns:
        true if level is enabled in the underlying API

      • isEnabled

        default boolean isEnabled(Log _log)
        Check if the given _log would be printed if logged
        Parameters:
        _log - log message to check
        Returns:
        true if this _log level is enabled in the underlying API
        See Also:
        isEnabled(org.bytemechanics.logger.Level)

      • log

        void log(Log _log)
        Send the given _log to the underlying API
        Parameters:
        _log - the LogAdapter representing the log
